import React from 'react' import APIService from '../components/APIService'; import {Card, Button} from 'react-bootstrap'; function BookCard(props) { const deleteBook = (googleId) => { console.log(googleId) APIService.DeleteBook(googleId) .then(resp => props.deleteBook(resp)) .catch(error => console.log(error)) } const editBook = (book) => { console.log(book) props.editBook(book) } return (
Title: {props.title}
Author: {props.authors}
Published Date: {props.publishedDate}
{props.quantity == 0 ?
OUT OF STOCK
: null} {props.quantity > 0 ?
Available Qty: {props.quantity}
: null} {props.quantity < 0 ?
NOT AVAILABLE
: null}
Modal heading Woohoo, you're reading this text in a modal!
) } export default BookCard
